text: te vrdve kahyum, hum mari banne dikari'o manthi ekane tamari sathe lagna karavava icchum chum, teni (mahera) atha varsa sudhi mari pase kama karaso, ham tame dasa varsa pura karo to te tamara taraphathi upakara rupe hase, hum evum kyareya nathi icchato ke tamane ko'i takalipha apum, allaha icchase to tame mane subhecchaka pamaso
